message: Clear's eyelashes cast delicate shadows on his cheeks.

name: クリア
message: "...Everyone dies eventually. That's why you try to live life to the fullest."

name: クリア
message: "But no matter what you do, it doesn't change the fact that every day you're one step closer to death."

name: クリア
message: "And once you die, you're just an object, a thing... No different from any machine."

name: クリア
message: "But despite that, you struggle so hard to do something in the time you have. Why? What are you trying to leave behind?"

name: クリア
message: "The simple fact that you were alive? But what's the use of that?"

name: クリア
message: "Isn't that just selfish?"
...I think I know what he's trying to say.
What is the meaning of life?
What does it mean to die?
Does anyone out there truly know the answers to these questions?
You can't exactly talk with people who've died...
Some people say you go to heaven when you die. Some people say you go to hell.
But none of them have seen it for themselves.
No one really knows what's waiting for them.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...That's a good question, but I don't know the answer. I'm don't think anyone does."

name: 蒼葉
message: "But I guess I have to agree that living is more or less selfish."

name: クリア
message: "Isn't it?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "There are some people who devote their entire lives to helping others, but I think most people are focused on living their own lives to the fullest."

name: 蒼葉
message: "But I think that's because, ultimately, you can't really imagine what comes after you die, so it's scary, right?"

name: クリア
message: "Because you can't imagine it?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah. I mean, we don't know what happens after we die. We don't know if anything even happens at all, right?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Even if you can imagine it, you can never prove it because you'd have to be dead to find out."

name: 蒼葉
message: "So I think that's why people try to leave behind some proof of who they were. So they can believe that even after they die, some part of them will remain."

name: 蒼葉
message: "And I think we feel that way because death is so unimaginable. That's why we all cling to life so desperately."

name: 蒼葉
message: "But I think everyone fears death to different degrees. It's not like living is fun all the time."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Sometimes things can get bad enough to make you want to die. I think some people see death as a release from all their troubles in life."

name: クリア
message: "A release?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah. Even a hellish death might seem like salvation from heaven to some people."

name: 蒼葉
message: "So, ultimately it depends on your interpretation of things. Everyone has to figure it out for themselves."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Personally, I'd like to try to find as much happiness as I can while I'm alive. I mean, you never know, you could always drop dead tomorrow."
Clear just gazes at me for a moment.
It looks like he's trying his damnedest to understand what I just said.

name: クリア
message: "...So in other words, you're saying that you're happier being with me than dying?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...That's a bit of a leap, but you're not wrong."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'm not such a saint that I'd want to spend my life with someone I don't like, after all."

name: クリア
message: "Really... Okay."
Clear nods a few times, like it finally makes sense to him.
And then he smiles softly.

name: クリア
message: "Master, you're always teaching me new things."

name: クリア
message: "Master?"
Clear's voice snaps me out of my daze. I let his smile distract me for a second there...

name: クリア
message: "Is something wrong?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Oh no, I was just thinking about how I've never seen you smile before."

name: クリア
message: "...I'm sorry, is my smile strange?"
I quickly shake my head.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Not at all."

name: クリア
message: "Oh. Good."
Clear smiles, relieved, then looks at me like he has something to ask.

name: クリア
message: "Um, Master, I have a request..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hm?"

name: クリア
message: "May I sing for you?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Sing?"

name: クリア
message: "You've taught me so many new things, and I'd like to sing for you to show my gratitude. May I?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Sure."
I wonder what kind of song he'll sing.
Clear takes a deep breath, then starts to sing.
A delicate melody flows from his lips.
His serene voice fills my heart with calm.
I take deep breaths, as if drinking in the music.
And then the words just spill from my mouth...

name: 蒼葉
message: "...I like this song of yours."
Clear stops singing and looks at me happily.

name: クリア
message: "Grandpa always loved it when I sang for him. That's why I thought it'd make you happy too."

name: クリア
message: "I'm so glad you like it."
Clear starts to sing again.
Ren is sitting next to me, relaxed with his eyes closed. His ears prick up from time to time.
As I listen to Clear's song, I think back to the question that crossed my mind yesterday.
What if Clear isn't human?
...It doesn't matter.
I mean, look at me... I have this weird power to control people with my voice.
It doesn't matter what Clear is.
Whatever he is, I like his song.
I give myself over to the melody, and for a short while, all my troubles are forgotten.
